import React from 'react' import PokeIcon from './PokeIcon' import { Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Card, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' const MyPokemon = (props) => { const mapMyPoke = props.myPokemonList.map(poke => ) return(

{props.currentUser.name}'s Pokemon

{mapMyPoke} ) } export default MyPokemon;
